verses.verse: (A Psalm of Asaph.) O God, <S%H430><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> have invaded <S%H935><s%> Thine inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> They have defiled <S%H2930><s%> Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple; <S%H1964><s%> They have laid <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in ruins. <S%H5856><s%>

They have given <S%H5414><s%> the dead <S%H5038><s%> bodies <S%H5038><s%> of Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> for food <S%H3978><s%> to the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> The flesh <S%H1320><s%> of Thy godly <S%H2623><s%> ones <S%H2623><s%> to the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

They have poured <S%H8210><s%> out their blood <S%H1818><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> And there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> them.
We have <S%H1961><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> A scoffing <S%H3933><s%> and derision <S%H7047><s%> to those around <S%H5439><s%> us.

How <S%H4100><s%> long, <S%H5704><s%> O Lord <S%H3068><s%>? Wilt Thou be angry <S%H599><s%> forever <S%H5331><s%>? Will Thy jealousy <S%H7068><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>?

Pour <S%H8210><s%> out Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> do not know <S%H3045><s%> Thee, And upon the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> which <S%H834><s%> do not call <S%H7121><s%> upon Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
For they have devoured <S%H398><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> And laid <S%H8074><s%> waste <S%H8074><s%> his habitation. <S%H5116><s%>

Do not remember <S%H2142><s%> the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of [our] forefathers <S%H7223><s%> against us; Let Thy compassion <S%H7356><s%> come <S%H6923><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> to meet <S%H6923><s%> us; For we are brought <S%H1809><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> low. <S%H1809><s%>

Help <S%H5826><s%> us, O God <S%H430><s%> of our salvation, <S%H3468><s%> for the glory <S%H9202><s%> of Thy name; <S%H8034><s%> And deliver <S%H5337><s%> us, and forgive <S%H3722><s%> our sins, <S%H9128><s%> for Thy name's sake. <S%H4616><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> should the nations <S%H1471><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Where <S%H346><s%> is their God <S%H430><s%>?" Let there be known <S%H3045><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> in our sight, <S%H5869><s%> Vengeance <S%H5360><s%> for the blood <S%H1818><s%> of Thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> which has been shed. <S%H8210><s%>

Let the groaning <S%H603><s%> of the prisoner <S%H615><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee; According to the greatness <S%H1433><s%> of Thy power <S%H2220><s%> preserve <S%H3498><s%> those <S%H1121><s%> who <S%H1121><s%> are doomed <S%H1121><s%> to die. <S%H8546><s%>

And return <S%H7725><s%> to our neighbors <S%H7934><s%> sevenfold <S%H7659><s%> into their bosom <S%H2436><s%> The reproach <S%H2781><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> Thee, O Lord. <S%H136><s%>

So we Thy people <S%H5971><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Thy pasture <S%H4830><s%> Will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee forever; <S%H5769><s%> To all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%> we will tell <S%H5608><s%> of Thy praise. <S%H8416><s%>
